name: Shirish Productions
tag_list: software-company, website-development, software-application-development, web-hosting, domain-name-registrations, flash-development, technical-training, wordpress-development, joomla-development, online-branding, company-branding, video-ads, video-editing
overview:
Computer has become a major part of our life today.. The way we represent over internet (the look and feel) matters more then how we personally appear. The time has changed with technology and now is the time to cope with new technologies and match up with the current scenario. So we bring to you the New Generation Multimedia development firm SHIRISH PRODUCTIONS.

@ Shirish Productions, we adopt a DATA Technological Method: We DESIGN - to change the way how web/internet looks, We ADVERTISE - to present your business the best way possible, We TRAIN - to keep people up-to date, and We AUTOMATE - to provide you all the technical solutions.

Join hands with us and we take you where you want to be! You Think! We Create!!

Shirish Productions is a Computer Media Development Company founded by Mr. Shirish Chincholimath in the year 2010. Shirish Productions is expertise in:

  • Technical Training: o Classes for Swishmax (a Flash animation and Design tool) o Coaching Classes for HTML and PHP coding using Adobe Dreamweaver o Coaching for Content Management System and WordPress o Training of Adobe After Effects and Adobe Soundbooth o Computer basics and Internet
  • Advertisements, Media and Presentation Development: o Custom Advertisement, Videos and Promos:
  • 30-60 sec TV commercials
  • Internet video ads and banners
  • Web and Social media Promotions on Belgaum.Biz, Google Ads, Facebook, Twitter, Linked-in and many more
  • Flash Videos and Intros o Flash and Power Point Presentations, Banners and Image Sliders o Designing of Logos, Pamphlets, Booklets, Brochures, Large Banners and Holdings
  • Website Designing using latest technology: o Custom Flash and Flex websites o Rich Internet Applications o Custom HTML and CSS coding o PHP, Ajax, JSP, Servlets and Applets, ASPX and Silverlight web designer o Content management System (CMS) and Blogging sites o Mobile websites
  • Software and Application Development: o Software Development using Visual Basic, C sharp, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), Silverlight .net technologies o Java based Software and Mobile Applications o Flash and Flex Desktop applications and Game
